text:
The article discusses the upcoming American reality show "Squid Game: The Challenge," which is set to premiere on November 22, 2023. The show features 456 real players competing against each other for a grand prize of $456 million. The game is inspired by the original Korean version, but with new twists and surprises added. The contestants will be tested on their strategies, alliances, and personalities throughout the competition, and those who fail will be eliminated one by one.

The article provides information on the show's title, release date, country of origin, language, and runtime, as well as its IMDb rating and Douban score. It also lists several streaming platforms where the show can be watched, including iQIYI, Youku, and Bilibili.

Finally, the article invites readers to scan a QR code or search for the public account "影的后花园" (BluFilm) to follow the official WeChat account of the show's production team.
